abstract: A penny stock company denounces everyone.
snippet: A penny stock company denounces everyone.
lead_paragraph: Universal Express, a company that can pay its bills only by illegally selling unregistered shares, has taken out a full-page ad on page C11 of today’s Times. It bills the ad as a response to the “undeveloped articles” I wrote about the company last week. (Here are the column and a follow-up article.)
